<text text-anchor="start" x="1100.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> See all your smiling faces. Okay, St. ? xx xx.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="51" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay so I'm going to start off the discussion,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> but all of you have your questions with you</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="43" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we can respond to each other. Make sure we're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actively listening to our um to our classmates.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Right, s-, we don't want to repeat the same</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="52.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> going to start out with, well discuss this and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then we'll move on to your questions, is, "What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="51.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is the effect of beginning the novel with Ivan</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="67.5" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Ilych's funeral?" .. What did you think of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="82.5" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> begining the novel with the funeral?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24,-1648 24,-1648 406,-1648 406,-1648 24,-1648"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="15531.5" y="-1619.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 57 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="15410,-1478 15410,-1610 15810,-1610 15810,-1478 15410,-1478"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15437" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay good so you said a lot of things there. You</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15416" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> made some comment about the upper class. And how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15431" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about, how the upper class is selfish and how the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15447" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> upper class doesn't want to die. Right, that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15467" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> all good. How about, can you make any</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15442" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> connections to Tolstoy the author? Remember</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15435.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from the powerpoint? How did he feel about the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15444.5" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> upper class versus the peasant class? St. 12?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="15409,-1610 15409,-1610 15811,-1610 15811,-1610 15409,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="15409,-1477.5 15409,-1638.5 15811,-1638.5 15811,-1477.5 15409,-1477.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17415" y="-1604.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 58 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17485.5" y="-1589.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="17322,-1493 17322,-1580 17688,-1580 17688,-1493 17322,-1493"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17336.5" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> He found that the uh upper class couldn't find</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17354.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the true meaning of life and that even for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17348" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> himself, he said he didn't find a meaningful</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17328" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> life until he was a peasant and he could work for</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17025.5" y="-1657.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 61 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="16922,-1441 16922,-1648 17286,-1648 17286,-1441 16922,-1441"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16946" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Pure' is a good word, yea. Morally superior,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16958.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they lived a morally superior lifestyle in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16928" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> comparison to those of the upper class. So, here</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16933" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we are in chapter one, already seeing Tolstoy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16943" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> attiude about the Russian upper class of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16935" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> 1800's, about how he feels about them. About,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16943.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> bless you, how they're selfish, how they feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16931.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about death, how they treat one another, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16949" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that's pretty significant and I think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16942.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> through all of this, his end goal, as we'll talk</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16936.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about as we continue to, to read, is what St. 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16935.5" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> said, through all of this, his goal is to teach us</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17013" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that big theme which is?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16921,-1648 16921,-1648 17287,-1648 17287,-1648 16921,-1648"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16921,-1440 16921,-1676 17287,-1676 17287,-1440 16921,-1440"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16288" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Mmhmm. What did he say about the people of the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18600" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I love, I love your question! I love this part.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18584" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What do you guys think about that? What, what</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17763.5" y="-1675.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What? {"How to live.", St. 12} How to live very</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17757.5" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> good. How to live. Let's get some more questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17754" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from you guys. And when we have our discussions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17784" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> guys, I want you to think, think a little bit</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17768.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> deeper than just the comprehension. I already</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17792.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> assume that you've read it and that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17784.5" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand the book let's talk about, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17773" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> some of those bigger philosophical questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17764.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about life and death and how to live and how to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17794" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> treat death. Let's try to think that way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17764" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because this is our opportunity to examine how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17754.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we live our lives and how we look at death. This is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17771" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> our opportunity, we're looking at death subje-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17821.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I'm sorry, objectively instead of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17811" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> objectively. We're looking at death</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17783.5" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> objectively without any emotion attached,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17780.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this is our chance to examine our lives and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17765.5" y="-1420.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> potentially our own deaths someday long, long,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17827.5" y="-1405.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> long, in the far future. St. 19?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="17747,-1693 17747,-1693 18127,-1693 18127,-1693 17747,-1693"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="17747,-1395 17747,-1721 18127,-1721 18127,-1395 17747,-1395"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="19606,-1456 19606,-1618 19961,-1618 19961,-1456 19606,-1456"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19625.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um, like, when he, like, ... like, approached</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19618" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his coffin, I think that's what it was, um, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19612" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he didn't really know what to do, because, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19623" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he didn't kow, like, whether to, like, respect</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19641" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> him or, like, to hate him. Because, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19639" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they're all talking about, like, how, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19634" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they didn't really like him so, like, in this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19620.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> manner, he did die, and, like, so he thinks he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19634.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should respect him but, like, he still has,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19685" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like, so much hate for him.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21451" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, very good, and how many of you people have</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="22266" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Grief, big time grief. So much grief that you're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22277" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> not worried about what that guy over there</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22257.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> thinks of you, or what that guy over there thinks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22256" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of you or thinks about, you know, whether or not,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22270" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "He didn't bow," or "He didn't cross himself."</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22258.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Are these thoughts crossing your mind? So, how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22289" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> many people, sort of, giggled when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22278.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pictured Peter Ivanovich walking up to the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22276.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> coffin? If you didn't, that's okay. But now in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22274.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> reflection you can, you should, because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22298" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> satirizing Peter Ivanovich. What's his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22283" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relationship with Ivan Ilych? What's their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22386" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relationship?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22249,-1648 22249,-1648 22621,-1648 22621,-1648 22249,-1648"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="25992" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like how much people truly care about you even</text>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="31067,-1708 31067,-1735 31450,-1735 31450,-1708 31067,-1708"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31175.5" y="-1717.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 101 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="31067,-1381 31067,-1708 31450,-1708 31450,-1381 31067,-1381"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31106.5" y="-1690.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, fake. {some laughter from class} So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31100" y="-1675.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everybody, like, I know it sounds funny, but</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31099" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> ingrain that word into your memory for this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31099" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> book, because that's what these people are.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31102" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> These people are fake. They only do things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31093" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because society says that they should. Okay?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31091.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> They only do things because society says that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31079" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they should. Why did Ivan Ilych get married? Did</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31088" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he love her? Did we read that chapter yet? Oh,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31089.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's not two yet? Anybody read ahead? No? So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31100.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you'll find, when you read the next chapter,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31079" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that he didn't marry her because he loved her, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31109.5" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> married her because society said that he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31107.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should. And Peter Ivanovich isn't worried</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31100" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about the sadness he's feeling because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31100.5" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> lost his best friend, he's only worried about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31073" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what society says that he should do when he walks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31110.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up to the coffin. So, think about author's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31084" y="-1420.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> purpose and what Tolstoy's trying to prove with</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31091" y="-1405.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this kind of behavior. St. 19, does that answer</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31203" y="-1390.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> your question?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="31066,-1708 31066,-1708 31451,-1708 31451,-1708 31066,-1708"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="31065.5,-1380 31065.5,-1736 31450.5,-1736 31450.5,-1380 31065.5,-1380"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="35873.5" y="-935.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I mean, Peter Ivanovich feeks like, "Thank</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="41091.5" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, how would it be better? {"Yea.", St. 17}</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="41099" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, how would it be better for Peter. Let's</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="41080" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and say, "Why," what's wrong? {"xx xx xx", St. ?}</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="41088.5" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> down so xx xx. xx xx for class. Okay, how, what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="41103.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> did, for what reason might Peter Ivanovich</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="41119.5" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> apply for his brother in law's transfer?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="41085.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Knowing what you know about these people, St.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="44369.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um when it said that Ivan, like, screamed for</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="44056.5" y="-1687.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 143 - TEACHER</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="43968" y="-1660.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> And I think what's really important here is just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43960.5" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> keep in mind what these people do is, everything</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="43959" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> some way, to improve their own situation in some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43970.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> way but not for others. So, it's probably not as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43969" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> though he wants to help the brother in law, it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43969.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> probably that he wants to help out himself and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43984.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> makes his life a little bit better. So, I think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43972" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's important to note. Okay, what else? Try</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43967" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> not to give me questions about comprehension.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43980" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> If you had a question about comprehension,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43971" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let's not use that one, let's use a question that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43974.5" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> has a little bit more to do with theme or, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43997" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, those philosophical, philosophical</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43974.5" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions, sorry, that have to do with life and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43960.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> death. What else did you have there? Thanks, St.</text>

<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="48153,-1580 48153,-1622 48517,-1622 48517,-1580 48153,-1580"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="48245" y="-1604.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 156 - STUDENT 2</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="48175" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um it says uh, "He screamed for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="48166" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> without pausing for breath, it was unbearable.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="48159" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't know how I bore through it all. You could</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="48163" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hear him three rooms away. Oh, what I've been</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="48298.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> through."</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="48152,-1580 48152,-1580 48518,-1580 48518,-1580 48152,-1580"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="47785.5" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, the author is mocking or ridiculing or</text>

<!-- 153 -->

<title>153</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="47064,-1655 47064,-1682 47437,-1682 47437,-1655 47064,-1655"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47167.5" y="-1664.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 153 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="47064,-1433 47064,-1655 47437,-1655 47437,-1433 47064,-1433"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47085" y="-1637.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, so, pretty painful. Yea, alright now, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47089" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> guys can think of the worst pain you've ever</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47080.5" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> imagined, which I'm thinking, breaking a bone</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47084.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> might be that, I'm not sure, um but this guy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47070.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> probably in so much pain and I think maybe it's a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47073" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> combination of pain and denial at the same time,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47074.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's so much pain that he screams for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47091" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> straight. So, take your worst pain and think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47070" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about how miserable he must have been. Can you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47076.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> picture that? Pretty awfu? And now, what is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47079" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> satire that Tolstoy uses there? Go to that page,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47073" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> see if you can figure out what the satire is. What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47088.5" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is satire by the way? You all defined it at the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47199" y="-1442.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> start of class.</text>

<!-- 151 -->
<g id="node208" class="node">
<title>151</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="46412,-1603 46412,-1630 46790,-1630 46790,-1603 46412,-1603"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46518" y="-1612.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 151 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="46412,-1486 46412,-1603 46790,-1603 46790,-1486 46412,-1486"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46433" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, so ,I think that's a really important part</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46443.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of the text. Um he screamed for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46418.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> straight. Now, how many people have ever broken</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="46436" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> a bone here? Okay, did you scream? Anybody</text>

<!-- 163 -->

<title>163</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="50600,-1640 50600,-1667 50976,-1667 50976,-1640 50600,-1640"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50705" y="-1649.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 163 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="50600,-1448 50600,-1640 50976,-1640 50976,-1448 50600,-1448"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50609.5" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> The wife right? The widow! Sorry, um yes, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50624" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the widow, right? She should be like, "Oh my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50616.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> gosh! My poor husband!" But instead she says,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50606" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "Oh it was awful, I don't know how I bore through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50607" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it all! It was so hard on me! It was unbearable for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50624" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> me to stand the pain he was facing!" Are you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50607.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> kidding! So, how many people laughed when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50619" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> read that part? You should've laughed, and it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50627" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay now that you know, if you didn't, that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50609" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay, but now that you know, you should laugh at</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50630.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> these people when they say things like this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="50633" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> okay? Because why? Why is it funny? Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="50599,-1640 50599,-1640 50977,-1640 50977,-1640 50599,-1640"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="50599,-1447.5 50599,-1668.5 50977,-1668.5 50977,-1447.5 50599,-1447.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 171 -->
<g id="node222" class="node">
<title>171</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52062,-1670 52062,-1697 52443,-1697 52443,-1670 52062,-1670"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52169.5" y="-1679.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 171 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52062,-1418 52062,-1670 52443,-1670 52443,-1418 52062,-1418"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52101.5" y="-1652.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yea. Do you sort of look at this and say to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52081.5" y="-1637.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yourself, "Wow, these people are clueless. Why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52096" y="-1622.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> are they so, so silly, so oblivious?" Are you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52085.5" y="-1607.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> are you kinda looking at them, like, "Duh, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52068" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should know better than to behave that way." How</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52085.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> many people are thinking that in their minds?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52137" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like, she's definitely not acting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52084" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> appropriately. Okay, and I think Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52095.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> those things, that you kind of giggle at like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52082.5" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, I think he wants those things to stick out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52079.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like a sore thumb to you. This is your chance to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52092" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stop and examine your life and ask yourself,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52076.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "Would I ever do anything like that? I'm not this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52098.5" y="-1457.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> selfish, am I?" And I think that's really his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52080" y="-1442.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> goal. When you see them do things like this, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52075" y="-1427.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wants you to stop and look at your own life. Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="52061,-1670 52061,-1670 52444,-1670 52444,-1670 52061,-1670"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="52060.5,-1417.5 52060.5,-1698.5 52443.5,-1698.5 52443.5,-1417.5 52060.5,-1417.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 172 -->

<title>172</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="53696,-1588 53696,-1630 54072,-1630 54072,-1588 53696,-1588"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53789.5" y="-1612.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 172 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53864.5" y="-1597.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="53696,-1486 53696,-1588 54072,-1588 54072,-1486 53696,-1486"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53702" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Uh I found another example, when the widow was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53714" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> being selfish. When she was just talking to um</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53715.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Peter about the money that she could possibly</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53705" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> get, from the government, she wanted more than</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53705" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what she was given. And she actually cried when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53727.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> she figured out that she couldn't get more.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="53695,-1588 53695,-1588 54073,-1588 54073,-1588 53695,-1588"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="53695,-1485 53695,-1631 54073,-1631 54073,-1485 53695,-1485"/>
</g>

<!-- 175 -->
<g id="node226" class="node">
<title>175</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="53302,-1610 53302,-1637 53660,-1637 53660,-1610 53302,-1610"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53398" y="-1619.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 175 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="53302,-1478 53302,-1610 53660,-1610 53660,-1478 53302,-1478"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53321.5" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Absolutely. Absolutely! You kinda can't help</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53309.5" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> but laugh at these people, right? Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53323" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you to stop and ask yourself, "Do I have my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53349" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> priorities in line? Am I living my life</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53332" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> correctly? I don't behave like this, do I?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53308" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Cause this obviously is not the right way to live</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53316" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> according to Tolstoy, and I think we probably</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53417.5" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> know that. St. 8?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="53301,-1610 53301,-1610 53661,-1610 53661,-1610 53301,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="53301,-1477.5 53301,-1638.5 53661,-1638.5 53661,-1477.5 53301,-1477.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 173 -->
<g id="node227" class="node">
<title>173</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52887,-1595 52887,-1622 53266,-1622 53266,-1595 52887,-1595"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52993.5" y="-1604.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 173 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="52887,-1493 52887,-1595 53266,-1595 53266,-1493 52887,-1493"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52910" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> {laughter from Teacher} Yeah, I mean, when,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52909.5" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> when she's crying about her husband's death,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52923.5" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> she is easily able to control herself, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52895.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> But then, later on when we find that she can't get</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52917.5" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> anymore money, that she's really sad right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="52893" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What else is funny about that situation? Mmhmm?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="52886,-1595 52886,-1595 53267,-1595 53267,-1595 52886,-1595"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="52885.5,-1492.5 52885.5,-1623.5 53266.5,-1623.5 53266.5,-1492.5 52885.5,-1492.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="56986" y="-1597.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 176 - STUDENT 8</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57056.5" y="-1582.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="56888,-1501 56888,-1573 57264,-1573 57264,-1501 56888,-1501"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56906" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that another example would be that, on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56904" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> page 36, it says, "There is, in fact, no reason to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56894" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> assume this incident can keep us from spending a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57007" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pleasant evening."</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="56887,-1573 56887,-1573 57265,-1573 57265,-1573 56887,-1573"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="56887,-1500 56887,-1616 57265,-1616 57265,-1500 56887,-1500"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="57022" y="-1250.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 178 - STUDENT 8</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57064.5" y="-1235.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="56942,-1153.5 56942,-1225.5 57282,-1225.5 57282,-1153.5 56942,-1153.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56948" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So, just basically, people are um not thinking</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56956.5" y="-1193.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of his death they are just feeling the effect</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56951" y="-1178.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that they shouldn't be sad for him, that they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56970.5" y="-1163.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> should feel more happy that he's gone.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="56941,-1225.5 56941,-1225.5 57283,-1225.5 57283,-1225.5 56941,-1225.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="56941,-1152.5 56941,-1268.5 57283,-1268.5 57283,-1152.5 56941,-1152.5"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="56522,-1225.5 56522,-1252.5 56906,-1252.5 56906,-1225.5 56522,-1225.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56631" y="-1235.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 185 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="56522,-1168.5 56522,-1225.5 56906,-1225.5 56906,-1168.5 56522,-1168.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56528" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay. How else would you expect people to behave</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56551" y="-1193.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in a situation like this. Quiet people get your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56655" y="-1178.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> points in. St. 1?</text>

<!-- 183 -->

<title>183</title>

<text text-anchor="start" x="56219.5" y="-1250.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 183 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="56119,-1153.5 56119,-1240.5 56486,-1240.5 56486,-1153.5 56119,-1153.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56140" y="-1223.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Is this the time and place to be asking about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56131" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> money? No. This absolutely is not the time and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56125" y="-1193.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> place to be asking about money. What would you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56125" y="-1178.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> expect, what would you expect commonly in this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="56237.5" y="-1163.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation? St. 24?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="56118,-1240.5 56118,-1240.5 56487,-1240.5 56487,-1240.5 56118,-1240.5"/>

</g>

<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="55714,-1160.5 55714,-1217.5 56082,-1217.5 56082,-1160.5 55714,-1160.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55744" y="-1200.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> They're, like, at the funeral in front of him</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55720" y="-1185.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> talking, like, how they want more money and not</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55818" y="-1170.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really feeling for him.</text>

<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="55713,-1160 55713,-1261 56083,-1261 56083,-1160 55713,-1160"/>

<!-- 181 -->

<title>181</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="55280,-1285.5 55280,-1312.5 55678,-1312.5 55678,-1285.5 55280,-1285.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55396" y="-1295.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 181 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="55280,-1108.5 55280,-1285.5 55678,-1285.5 55678,-1108.5 55280,-1108.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55303" y="-1268.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yea, let's go out and play cards. Let's go out and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55304.5" y="-1253.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> play cards, right? "Let's hurry up and get out of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55310.5" y="-1238.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> here so we can play cards." Meanwhile, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55319" y="-1223.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> supposed to be their friend, their colleague,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55299" y="-1208.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> right? Let's go back to the idea of the widow. The</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55319.5" y="-1193.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> widow is talking to Peter Ivanovich. "Hey is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55286" y="-1178.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> there any way where I can get some more money out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55304.5" y="-1163.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of the government from this? Like, now that my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55310" y="-1148.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> husband's dead, can I get some more money?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55320.5" y="-1133.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Right? So, that part is funny but what else?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="55353" y="-1118.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Where are they right now? St. 17?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="55279,-1285.5 55279,-1285.5 55679,-1285.5 55679,-1285.5 55279,-1285.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="55279,-1107.5 55279,-1313.5 55679,-1313.5 55679,-1107.5 55279,-1107.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="54226" y="-1235.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 177 - TEACHER</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="58782" y="-1592.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Um so going back to the game of bridge uh so, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58791" y="-1577.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> says that Peter sat through the service and he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58793" y="-1562.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was one of the first people to leave to then go</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58801" y="-1547.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> play with Schwartz, uh playing bridges. So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58790.5" y="-1532.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> obviously this is one of the hyporitical uh cues</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58784" y="-1517.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of how the author portrays uh um, like, Peter ad</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58804.5" y="-1502.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his other close friends. So, my question is,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58776" y="-1487.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "How would you prove your friendship to someone</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58905.5" y="-1472.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> if they [died]."</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="58769,-1610 58769,-1610 59150,-1610 59150,-1610 58769,-1610"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="58768.5,-1462.5 58768.5,-1653.5 59149.5,-1653.5 59149.5,-1462.5 58768.5,-1462.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 189 -->
<g id="node242" class="node">
<title>189</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="58146,-1663 58146,-1690 58520,-1690 58520,-1663 58146,-1663"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58250" y="-1672.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 189 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="58146,-1426 58146,-1663 58520,-1663 58520,-1426 58146,-1426"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58164.5" y="-1645.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay. .. I think that we just expect a whole lot</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58152.5" y="-1630.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> more grief and how about kindness for the widow</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58161.5" y="-1615.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> or for the children? Like, "I'm so sorry for your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58173.5" y="-1600.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> loss." Those sorts of comments. I think that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58155" y="-1585.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> might be more of what we'd expect in a situation</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58160.5" y="-1570.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like this but we really don't see that from thsse</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58163.5" y="-1555.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> characters. And in chapter one, Tolstoy does a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58165.5" y="-1540.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really good job of character development, and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58165.5" y="-1525.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you start to learn about these characters, and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58152" y="-1510.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what kind of people they are. And that's gonna be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58168.5" y="-1495.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> important to our understanding of the rest of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58177" y="-1480.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the text. Alright, let's do another question.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58176" y="-1465.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Or if it's not on your list and it's something</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58186" y="-1450.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that is, like, a burning question, for you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="58249.5" y="-1435.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let's do it. Okay, St. 2?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="58145,-1663 58145,-1663 58521,-1663 58521,-1663 58145,-1663"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="58145,-1425 58145,-1691 58521,-1691 58521,-1425 58145,-1425"/>
</g>
